price: Dhe kur erdhën magjistarët e Faraonit, thanë: “A do të shpërblehemi, nëse fitojmë?”
arabic: وَجَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجۡرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wajāa al-saḥaratu fir'ʿawna qālū inna lanā la-ajran in kunnā naḥnu al-ghālibīna
